Uses of Interface
picard.sam.PrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy

  • Packages that use PrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy 
    Package Description
    picard.sam  

    • Uses of PrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy in picard.sam

      Classes in picard.sam that implement PrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BestEndMapqPrimaryAlignmentStrategy
      For an aligner that aligns each end independently, select the alignment for each end with the best MAPQ, and make that the primary.
      class  BestMapqPrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy
      This strategy was designed for TopHat output, but could be of general utility.
      class  EarliestFragmentPrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy
      When it is necessary to pick a primary alignment from a group of alignments for a read, pick the one that maps the earliest base in the read.
      class  MostDistantPrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy
      For a paired-end aligner that aligns each end independently, select the pair of alignments that result in the largest insert size.
      Constructors in picard.sam with parameters of type PrimaryAlignmentSelectionStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
